item.title: Git rebase versioned branches
item.description: git checkout -b 2.0-oss <existing oss branch> # keep the commits to rebase #git rebase -i <fork point> # rebase to tidy patches (as needed) # equivalent to `git reset --hard <upstream/2.0 branch> && git cherry-pick <fork point>..<existing oss branch>` git rebase...

item.title: sort
item.description: rg .. | sort -t : -sk 1,1 Stable (-s) sort by first key (-k 1,1) only, delimited by : (-t :). In this particular case you could use rg --sort=path ..

item.title: AWS Global Accelerator
item.description: TCP termination at the edge TCP termination at the edge improves latency: GA also optimizes throughput for the long fat network between edge and target region: Tune TCP parameters for high BDP Use high initcwnd to cheat TCP slow start Jumbo frames Large receive window size, TCP buffers tuning Large ...

item.title: Amazon Aurora
item.description: Redundancy 6 copies across 3 AZs to tolerate AZ+1 failures.

item.title: Tips for a small PostgreSQL VPS
item.description: Memory Use Linux v7.0+ kernel, and enable zswap to compress memory.

item.title: CodeLayer
